item.title: Trump is bringing back the AI law moratorium

item.title: Tesla’s Autopilot is under scrutiny in a rare jury trial
item.description: Tesla is on trial in Miami today in a case that accuses Elon Musk’s company of liability in a fatal crash involving Autopilot. The driver-assist system has come under scrutiny in the past for a number

item.title: Tornado Cash Made Crypto Anonymous. Now One of Its Creators Faces Trial
item.description: Roman Storm, one of the developers of crypto-anonymizing tool Tornado Cash, will stand trial in New York starting July 14. His supporters claim the freedom to develop software is under threat.
